page.title: 06HOMELIFE-1
page.content: The houses vary largely from small 2 bedroomed 100 year old terraced cottages to 3 bedroomed 20 year old semi-detatched council houses. {ROUTINE}-Most peoples lives revolve around their homes,jobs and families.The daily household routine consists mainly of shopping, laundry, cleaning, preparing meals and other household chores.These chores are usually carried out during the day and evening is left to leisure. {FOOD}-Breakfast is usually a light meal.Lunch and tea are interchangeable and may consist of vegetables, meat, potatoes or just beans on toast or other convenience foods such as grilled pizzas. {TIME}-Here are two different daily routines, one of a housewife with children living in Lazenby and the other of an elderly married man living
